title: Fight simulator for TFT?
body:
Ie a custom mode of TFT where we can place two teams off champions and test how they would fare against each other?

For example, if I wanted to see what a team with a 3 star Jinx and a three star draven with IE BT and RFC does against a team with 9 3 star 1/2 cost champs, I could simply enter the info and see a simulated battle between them?

It would help so much with theorycrafting

replies.body: I've had very similar thoughts.  It's hard to test endgame teamcomps even if you play multiple games with a specific purpose.

homie they are literally axing content left and right to shove cash grabs into death recap, you honestly think something like this even passes through the realm of possibility?
